spell1.name: REPULSOR BLAST
spell1.description: Fire nano pulse cannons forward. After two one-handed shots, the third fires dual blasters for higher damage at extra ammo cost.
spell1.changeDescription: Repulsor first-two hits reduced: Normal 40→35; Armor Overdrive 50→45

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Repulsor Blast and Unibeam share the same ammo count

spell2.name: UNIBEAM
spell2.description: Channel a beam of focused energy that deals continuous damage.

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Repulsor Blast and Unibeam share the same ammo count

spell3.name: HYPER-VELOCITY
spell3.description: Activate Hyper-Velocity state for swift forward flight.

spell4.name: ARMOR OVERDRIVE
spell4.description: Activate Armor Overdrive, enhancing Repulsor Blast and Unibeam.

spell5.name: MICRO-MISSILE BARRAGE
spell5.description: Launch a bombardment of scattered missiles (during Hyper-Velocity or Armor Overdrive).

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Scatter-type projectile that generates a spell area upon impact

attributes.label: SPELL FIELD DAMAGE
attributes.value: 20 per round (Micro-Missile Barrage), 15 per round (Armor Overdrive)

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Launches beneath Iron Man (M.M.); launches toward crosshair in Armor Overdrive

spell6.name: INVINCIBLE PULSE CANNON
spell6.description: Fire a devastating pulse cannon; the projectile creates a damaging field as it travels and a large explosion upon impact.
spell6.changeDescription: Invincible Pulse Cannon energy cost increased 2800→3400

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: SPELL FIELD RANGE
attributes.value: 10m spherical radius (Spell Field); 15×5×5m dispersive field while traveling

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Creates dispersive DoT while traveling before the main detonation
